name: Road to Infinity - TheZZAZZGlitch's April Fools Event 2021
name_original: Road to Infinity - TheZZAZZGlitch's April Fools Event 2021
description:
This is just a save file. But if you load it in your favorite GameBoy emulator, together with an English Pokémon Red ROM, you're in for an entirely new adventure. This is done through the magic of arbitrary code execution exploits.

Check out my profile page for a more detailed description of what this is.

Explore a procedurally generated map. Look for items, complete tasks, see how long you're able to survive. Battle for the top score on the online leaderboard - the top scores will be featured on my niche Pokémon glitching YouTube channel.

And if you're into this kind of thing, there are also some CTF-like hacking challenges. But don't worry - the whole game can be completed without the need to be a hacker!

Check out the previous April Fools challenges:
Fools2019: Trouble in Glitch Islands (an unofficial server is available if you want to play!)
Fools2018: Welcome to Glitchland (an unofficial server is available too!)
Fools2017: missingno.sav

Note: the ROM is not included in the downloads; you're on your own on that one.
